member.name: M:Itron.Metering.DeviceDataTypes.LoadProfileData.CombineIntervals(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method returns the new combined load profile data. If it is unable to combine the intervals then it will just return the data as is.
member.param: The new interval length duration for the load profile data.
member.returns: The new combined load profile data.
member.exception: This exception is thrown if the data is demand. We would have to convert to energy, combine intervals, and then convert back to demand. So this is currently not supported.

member.name: T:Itron.Metering.DeviceDataTypes.VarInt
member.summary: This class provides a method for decoding a varint from a buffer of bytes.

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.DeviceDataTypes.VarInt.DecodeVarInt(System.Byte[],System.UInt16@,System.Byte@)
member.summary: This method decodes a varint encoded byte array. Each byte in a varint, except the last byte, has the most significant bit (msb) set – this indicates that there are further bytes to come. The lower 7 bits of each byte are used to store the two's complement representation of the number in groups of 7 bits, least significant group first.
member.param: the byte array containing the varint
keeps track of where we are in the byte array
records how many bytes are taken up by the varint

member.name: M:Itron.Metering.DeviceDataTypes.TLVData.#ctor
